website_summaries.verdict: Full of features and accessories, this playset will inspire lots of daring superhero scenes.
pros: For kids who want to reenact their favorite scenes, this hydroliner gives them the perfect setting
This playset includes many accessories, such as Elastigirl, a watercraft, and 2 projectiles
Kids love the movable parts and surprises, such as the rotating cooling chamber and trap door, that keep the fun going
cons: Only 2 projectile missiles are included, which are small and easy to lose

customer_reviews.title: Could be made better
customer_reviews.text: My son really wanted this for his 4th birthday. We got him one, and he loves it. But, many of the pieces are very delicate. There are 2 doors on the side that make a circle, and you can't open them without at least 1 door falling off. He still enjoys playing it, but he's constantly asking for help to get the doors back on.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but it’s okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was good my son loved it. Some of the pieces kept falling off and he was always crying about it but overall he came to really like it even with the messed up pieces. Now since his birthday in September he hasn’t played with it anymore. But in that moment he liked it for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Alaila cruz

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the Birthday Party
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old grandson picked this out on Amazon and loves it. It allows him to pretend play he’s on a ship and very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: TinaM

customer_reviews.title: This toy keeps breaking over and over again... it falls apart at my son's touch
customer_reviews.text: My poor kid was SO excited about this boat. It has everything a kid would love.... lots of different fun parts to open, little arrows to shoot, an escape hatch, etc. The big issue is that the doors keep breaking off, the escape shoot keeps breaking, the arm extension broke off... The poor kid can't use this without something breaking. And it is SO frustrating for him (and his parents who have to deal with the tantrums). The video is of the probably 20th time since he opened it a day previously that it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Anjali

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $40.
customer_reviews.text: Doors, extended arm and ice slide keeps falling off. Purchased for $40 and I’d value it at about $15.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My 3 year old grandson loves this boat. It has working parts-so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun bath toy, keeps my boy nice and clean. Bath time, fun time!
customer_reviews.author: R. F. Laurita

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son whom has become very obsessed with the movie Incrediables 2 and wants all the figures and toys. It was a great gifts plays with it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A big pretty toy and my kid loved it. You could do so much with it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. And found it cheaper than other sites and stores.
customer_reviews.author: arturo martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: this whole ship was perfect. it came in on time and was a great gift for my daughters birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Parker

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. He has a ton of fun playing with it. My only issue is the ship door comes off the hinge a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 40 but still a nice sized toy
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t say it’s worth 40 bucks.... missle won’t shoot and the slide is cheap and falls off but my son loved it so I guess that counts for somthing. 40 bucks tho 🤨
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son had been asking for this toy for some time now and I hated that I couldn’t find it in stores. Luckily Amazon came through for Christmas and he loved it! The only reason it gets 4 stars instead of 5 stars is because it is heavier then I thought and it does not float. But overall its pretty fun and durable. I would definitely recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Such a durable toy, way better then I was expecting!! Incredibles toys are hard to come by in stores so this is the perfect gift for a kiddo that’s into incredibles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome toy
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it. Great size, fits the whole superhero family. It has a slide that my kid loves. Jist the doors fall off, had to put them vak and was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Patty S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I loved watching my grandson play with this toy,it is of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Non

customer_reviews.title: Hydroliner
customer_reviews.text: It's big and a neat looking Hydroliner. however, it is very cheaply made and doors, slide, and arm fall off constantly. They are easy to put back bus really should be higher quality and more secure with cost of the ship.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Tornabeni

customer_reviews.title: it does include action figure
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my granddaughter and she loved it!!! it does have the action figure that"s pictured
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy but I think was better if came with others Incredibles like Bob and Frozone
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Salomao

customer_reviews.title: Such a great Incredibles luxury liner.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Incredibles ship. Just wish it could go on the Bath tub!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Just received package! Bigger than expected... will update after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun
customer_reviews.text: My son is completely infatuated with his Incredibles boat. Since it arrived he hasn't stopped playing with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Tarin

customer_reviews.title: This toy has little to offer but an inflated price ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy has little to offer but an inflated price tag. It was a birthday gift for my grandson that I wish I had not purchased
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Made poorly. Ice slide kept falling off the minute we took it out of the box, doors on the ship do Not close properly and the rocket launcher at the top stopped working within the first few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old got a lot of toys for his birthday and he said this was the best. It has many fun features.
customer_reviews.author: Free thought

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T FLOAT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be a new bath toys or pool toy. However it stinks straight to the bottom. Who would design a boat that doesn’t even flinch? So lame!
customer_reviews.author: Shyla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Boats and Heroes!
customer_reviews.text: The hydroliner has a lot of doors and compartments to place figurines in. It makes it a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Torberntsson

product_meta.title: The Incredibles 2 Hydroliner (Ship) Action Playset comes with Elastigirl Junior Super Figure
product_meta.description: The Incredibles are back! Hydroliner Playset, The Incredibles 2 brings back everyone's favorite family of superheroes in an exciting, hilarious, and heartfelt supre-sequel. This new chapter sees Mr. Incredible, Elsaticgirl, Violet and Jack-Jack encounter a brand new nemesis that puts the family's powers to to the ultimate test. Recreate all your favorite sence from Disney The Incredibles 2 with this Precool Juniors Supers Hydroliner Playset! Shoot projectiles, fold out the ice slide, use the rotating cooling chamber, trap door, watercraft launcher and the grabing arm for Incredible action! Hydroliner Playset Includes: 1 Hydroliner, 1 Elastigirl Figure, 1 watercraft, 1 lifesaver and 2 projectiles. Note: Toy does not float and is not intended for use in water. Collect all the Precool Junior Supers Toys from Jakks Pacific (Each Sold Separately). Recommended for Ages: 4+
feature_bullets: Recreate all your favorite scenes from The Incredibles 2 with this Junior Supers Hydroliner Playset
Shoot projectiles, fold out the ice slide, use the rotating cooling chamber, trap door, watercraft launcher and the grabbing arm for Incredible action
Hydroliner Playset Includes: 1 Hydroliner, 1 Elastigirl Figure, 1 watercraft, 1 lifesaver and 2 projectiles
Collect all the Junior Supers Toys from Jakks Pacific (Each Sold Separately). Recommended for Ages: 3+
